item.title: Let's Talk About Dual Funding: Protocol Overview
item.description: Openning a Lightning Channel Unspent transaction output is locked up. Bitcoin is unspent, but it requires two parties to sign. In order to spend it, you need two people to sign off on it. How do we make that happen? A multisig that two people sign off, so it’s 2 of 2 multisig. We’re talking about lightning channels. A lightning channel is a UTXO that is locked up with a 2 of 2 (multisig).
